publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3110 Elaine Murray: 20th Anniversary of the Lockerbie Air Disaster—That the Parliament notes that Sunday 21 December 2008 will be the 20th anniversary of the Lockerbie air disaster; remembers with sadness the indiscriminate murder of 270 people from 21 countries and the consequences of this atrocity on their families, the community and the individuals involved in its aftermath, and recalls the courage and kindness of the people of Lockerbie at the time and over the past twenty years. Supported by: Elizabeth Smith*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Kenneth Gibson*, Cathy Jamieson*, Nanette Milne*, Mike Pringle*, Margaret Curran*, Jim Tolson*, Liam McArthur*, Jamie McGrigor*, John Park*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Bill Kidd*, Ross Finnie*, Jim Hume*, Bob Doris*, Des McNulty*, John Lamont*, John Scott*, Keith Brown*, David Stewart*, Sandra White*, Malcolm Chisholm*, Mary Mulligan*, Murdo Fraser*, Karen Whitefield*, Patrick Harvie*, Derek Brownlee*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Robert Brown*, Bill Butler*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, James Kelly*, Jackie Baillie*, Christina McKelvie*, Dave Thompson*, Mary Scanlon*, Andy Kerr*, Angela Constance*, David Whitton*, Claire Baker*, Sarah Boyack*, Jackson Carlaw*, Alex Neil*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Christine Grahame*, Jamie Hepburn*, Hugh Henry*, Brian Adam*, Peter Peacock*, Rhoda Grant*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Robin Harper*, Gil Paterson*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Cathie Craigie*, Patricia Ferguson*, Trish Godman*, Marlyn Glen*, Jack McConnell*, Michael Matheson*
S3M-3110 20th Anniversary of the Lockerbie Air Disaster (lodged on 15 December 2008) Stuart McMillan*
